em_field Class Reference

Inherits mdp_complex_field.

List of all members.

Detailed Description

the chromo-electr-magnetic field for any SU(n)

Example: 

///    int nc=3; 
///    int box[]={10,8,8,8};
///    mdp_lattice lattice(4,box);
///    gauge_field U(lattice,nc);
///    mdp_site x(lattice);
///    U.load("myfield");
///    compute_em_field(U);
///    forallsites(x)
///      for(int mu=0; mu<U.ndim; mu++)
///        for(int nu=mu+1; nu<U.ndim; nu++)
///          cout << U.em(x,mu,nu) << endl;
///
Note that U.em(x,mu,nu) is and it is a color matrix in SU(nc). is the lattice spacing.
